hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #an Ice Trap# and #an Ice Trap#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #an Ice Trap#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##the Lost Woods## has #2# major items.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Potion Bottle#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Hammer Room Clear Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Milk Bottle#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Potion Bottle#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Minuet of Forest#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #a Water Temple Small Key# can be found at #Zora's Domain#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that between the #crawl spaces in the Spirit Temple# chests contain...^ #an Ice Trap# and #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Early Torches Chest

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Game Key#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #a Game Key# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #4# major items.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #6# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path of time.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a #Big Skulltula# guarding a Gold one.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Water Trial Right Chest

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that those who seek #sunken silver rupees# will find #a Goron Tunic#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Minuet of Forest#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #a Fire Temple Small Key# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #Magic Beans#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #Lakeside Laboratory#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #Magic Beans#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #the Tower#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #Evil's Bane#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 2 Bottom

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Game Key#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that plundering #the Water Temple# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

ZD (Mweep).text: If you see something suspicious, bomb it!

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ice Trap#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ice Trap#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #an Ice Trap# and #Zelda's Lullaby#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Game Key#.
